_comment: PR #64 real-world scenario: reviews posted via shared bot account (miller46bot) on behalf of reviewer agents. 4 of 5 reviews are CHANGES_REQUESTED, 1 is APPROVED. The bot account login does not match agent names in required_reviewers.
title: [backend] Security hardening: token rotation, error handling, and validation

reviews.body:
VERDICT: REQUEST_CHANGES

Thanks for the solid hardening work here.

## Blocking architectural/security concern:

**1) Over-broad replay containment revokes all user sessions for non-replay cases**

Please address item (1) before merge.

VERDICT: APPROVE

## Code Review: PR #64 - Security Hardening

Approve - The security improvements significantly outweigh the minor issues. Production-ready.

VERDICT: REQUEST_CHANGES

Thanks for the solid hardening work here.

Please address item (1) before merge.

VERDICT: REQUEST_CHANGES

Overall this PR is a strong step forward on auth hardening.

After the three blocking items are addressed, this looks close to approvable.

VERDICT: REQUEST_CHANGES

## Security Hardening PR Review

### Must-Fix Issues

1) consume_refresh_token can raise unhandled exception (correctness bug)
